title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish, the JAR creation fails with the error message 'Unsaved Editors'5.
OB: The JAR packager reports open files very late, causing the creation process to fail with the error 'Unsaved Editors'5'.
SR: Ensure that the JAR packager reports open files in a timely manner to prevent creation failures. Investigate and address the issue causing the 'Unsaved Editors'5' error during JAR creation.
